comments.body: Maybe nicer to replace this with something a little more elegant e.g. `Runner`.
`io.gatling.app.Runner` already exists, it is the standard runner. I am going to rename it to `CustomRunner`

diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,44 @@
